department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: To acquire miscellaneous groceries for 17 Wing Winnipeg.
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Western Region, on behalf of Department of National Defence (DND), has a requirement for Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISO’s) for the supply, delivery and offloading of Miscellaneous Groceries on an as and when requested basis to 17 Wing, in Winnipeg Manitoba, for the period of the Standing Offer.
full_summary:
=====================================

### W0117-220007 - Miscellaneous Groceries

#### Announcement Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4298528402
* **Publication Date:** March 14, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** Wednesday, May 1, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer

#### Background

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Western Region, on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites interested suppliers to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) for the supply and delivery of miscellaneous groceries to 17 Wing in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

#### Description of Requirements

The Department of National Defence is seeking Stand-alone Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISO) for the supply, delivery and offloading of miscellaneous groceries on an as and when requested basis to 17 Wing in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

#### Key Requirements

* Solicitation Number: WS4298528402
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: Winnipeg, Manitoba
* Duration of Standing Offer: Expected Contract Start Date: December 1, 2022; Expected Contract End Date: November 30, 2024

#### Evaluation Criteria

The solicitation will be evaluated on the basis of Lowest Price, among other factors.

#### How to Access the Solicitation

A copy of the solicitation is available on the following website:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19094963?extsite=MTkwOTQ5NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Further Information

Rina Marsland
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Contact Info: rina.marsland@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Important Dates and Times

Please note the following dates and times for this solicitation:
- Publication Date: March 14, 2024
- Tender Closing Date: Wednesday, May 1, 2024, at 14:00:00

### Distribution List

The information contained within this announcement is intended for federal contractors and suppliers who are interested in participating in this opportunity. Please share, distribute, and provide copies of this notice as required.

All updates on the status of this solicitation will be posted on the public-facing procurement website: [insert link]. All parties interested in pursuing this solicitation will need to check this website
